attributes.action: I want you to make it so school uniform is not necessary.
attributes.additional_details: I want to make it so that schools do not force children to wear school uniform. This is because of people who cannot afford school uniform and get told off in school for not properly dressing. another reason for this is that students would be able to express how they want to dress! It would also save time in the morning getting dressed as school uniform takes quite alot of time to get on.
attributes.background: I want you to make it so that schools do not force children to wear school uniform. This is because of people who cannot afford school uniform and get told off in school for not properly dressing. another reason for this is that students would be able to express how they want to dress!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Ban school uniforms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701824
